00005 // Description: definition de la classe FLTK_Display, widget d'affichage
00006 // graphique, et de la classe FLTK_Display_Control, widget de controle associe.

00013 // callback(s)
00014 void cb_empty_callback (Fl_Widget *, void *) {}
00015 
00016 // constructeur(s)
00017 FLTK_Display::FLTK_Display (const double _unit_size, 
00018                             const double _scroll_x, const double _scroll_y,
00019                             const int _w, const int _h, const char* _title) 
00020   : Fl_Double_Window (_w, _h, _title) 
00021 {
00022   unit_size = init_unit_size = _unit_size;
00023   scroll_x = init_scroll_x = _scroll_x; 
00024   scroll_y = init_scroll_y = _scroll_y;
00025   callback (cb_empty_callback); resizable (this); end (); show ();
00026 }
00027 
00028 // reinitialisation de list_objects
00029 void FLTK_Display::clear_objects ()
00030 {
00031   // d'abord on desalloue les objets pointes par list_objects
00032   for (vector<FLTK_Graphic_Object *>::iterator index = list_objects.begin ();
00033        index != list_objects.end (); 
00034        ++index)
00035     { delete (*index); }
00036   // puis on reinitialise le vecteur list_objects
00037   list_objects.clear ();
00038 }
00039 
00040 // destructeur
00041 FLTK_Display::~FLTK_Display ()
00042 {
00043   clear_objects ();
00044 }
00045 
00046 // lecture des attributs
00047 double FLTK_Display::get_init_unit_size () const { return init_unit_size; }
00048 double FLTK_Display::get_init_scroll_x () const { return init_scroll_x; }
00049 double FLTK_Display::get_init_scroll_y () const { return init_scroll_y; }
00050 double FLTK_Display::get_unit_size () const { return unit_size; }
00051 double FLTK_Display::get_scroll_x () const { return scroll_x; }
00052 double FLTK_Display::get_scroll_y () const { return scroll_y; }
00053 vector<FLTK_Graphic_Object *> FLTK_Display::get_list_objects () const {
00054   return list_objects; }

00058 { unit_size = _unit_size; }
00059 void FLTK_Display::set_scroll_x (const double _scroll_x) 
00060 { scroll_x = _scroll_x; }
00061 void FLTK_Display::set_scroll_y (const double _scroll_y)

00064 // ajout d'un object graphique dans list_objects
00065 void FLTK_Display::add_object (FLTK_Graphic_Object *object)
00066 { list_objects.push_back(object); }
00067 
00068 // affichage graphique des objets de list_objects
00069 void FLTK_Display::draw () 
00070 {
00071   fl_clip (0, 0, w(), h());
00072   fl_color (FL_WHITE);          // fond blanc
00073   fl_rectf (0, 0, w(), h());
00074 
00075   fl_color (FL_GRAY);           // repere gris
00076   fl_line_style (FL_DASH);
00077   fl_line                       // axes x et y
00078     (world_to_display_x (-0.25, get_unit_size (), get_scroll_x ()), 
00079      world_to_display_y (0, get_unit_size (), get_scroll_y ()), 
00080      world_to_display_x (1.25, get_unit_size (), get_scroll_x ()), 
00081      world_to_display_y (0, get_unit_size (), get_scroll_y ()));
00082   fl_line 
00083     (world_to_display_x (0, get_unit_size (), get_scroll_x ()), 
00084      world_to_display_y (-0.25, get_unit_size (), get_scroll_y ()),
00085      world_to_display_x (0, get_unit_size (), get_scroll_x ()), 
00086      world_to_display_y (1.25, get_unit_size (), get_scroll_y ()));
00087   fl_line_style (FL_SOLID);
00088   fl_line                       // "tickmarks"
00089     (world_to_display_x (1, get_unit_size (), get_scroll_x ()), 
00090      world_to_display_y (-0.1, get_unit_size (), get_scroll_y ()), 
00091      world_to_display_x (1, get_unit_size (), get_scroll_x ()), 
00092      world_to_display_y (0.1, get_unit_size (), get_scroll_y ()));
00093   fl_line 
00094     (world_to_display_x (-0.1, get_unit_size (), get_scroll_x ()), 
00095      world_to_display_y (1, get_unit_size (), get_scroll_y ()),
00096      world_to_display_x (0.1, get_unit_size (), get_scroll_x ()), 
00097      world_to_display_y (1, get_unit_size (), get_scroll_y ()));
00098 
00099   // affichage des objets de list_objects
00100   for (vector<FLTK_Graphic_Object *>::iterator index = list_objects.begin ();
00101        index != list_objects.end (); 
00102        ++index)
00103     { 
00104       (*index)->draw (this);
00105     }
00106   fl_pop_clip();
00107 }
00108 
00109 // gestion des evenements
00110 int FLTK_Display::handle (int event) 
00111 {
00112   switch (event) {
00113   case FL_ENTER:
00114     // modification du curseur quand celui-ci entre dans la fenetre
00115     cursor (Fl_Cursor (18), FL_BLACK, FL_WHITE);
00116     return 1;
00117   case FL_LEAVE:
00118     // restauration du curseur quand celui-ci quitte la fenetre
00119     cursor (FL_CURSOR_DEFAULT, FL_BLACK, FL_WHITE);
00120     return 1;
00121   case FL_PUSH:
00122     // appel du callback (eventuellement defini par l'utilisateur)
00123     do_callback ();
00124     return 1;
00125   case FL_KEYBOARD:
00126     // appel du callback (eventuellement defini par l'utilisateur)
00127     do_callback ();
00128     return 1;
00129   default:
00130     return 0;
00131   }
00132 }

00136 // FLTK_Display_Control

00138 // callbacks
00139 // quit button
00140 void cb_quit (Fl_Widget *w, void *data) 
00141 {   
00142   FLTK_Display *display = (FLTK_Display *)data;
00143   display->hide ();
00144   w->window ()->hide ();
00145 }
00146 
00147 // clear button
00148 void cb_clear (Fl_Widget *, void *data) 
00149   // reinitialisation de la liste des objets graphiques
00150 {   
00151   FLTK_Display *display = (FLTK_Display *)data;
00152   display->clear_objects (); 
00153   display->redraw ();
00154 }

00156 // xfig output button
00157 void cb_xfig (Fl_Widget *, void *data) 
00158 {   
00159   FLTK_Display *display = (FLTK_Display *)data;
00160   // creation du nom du fichier de sortie
00161   char *filename;
00162   sprintf (filename, "%s-output.fig", display->label());
00163   // ouverture du fichier de sortie xfig
00164   ofstream output (filename, ios::out);
00165   // entete du fichier xfig
00166   output << "#FIG 3.2" << endl << "Portrait" << endl << "Center" << endl 
00167          << "Inches" << endl << "A4" << endl << "100.00" << endl 
00168          << "Single" << endl << "-2" << endl << "1200 2" << endl 
00169          << "# end of preamble" << endl
00170          << "# definition of the grey colors" << endl
00171          << "0 32 #202020" << endl // dark grey
00172          << "0 33 #404040" << endl
00173          << "0 34 #606060" << endl
00174          << "0 35 #808080" << endl // medium grey
00175          << "0 36 #A0A0A0" << endl
00176          << "0 37 #C0C0C0" << endl
00177          << "0 38 #E0E0E0" << endl; // light grey
00178   // repere
00179   int x1, x2, y1, y2;
00180   output << "# origin frame" << endl;
00181   output << "2 1 1 1 35 -1 100 0 -1 0.000 0 0 -1 0 0 2" << endl; // axe x
00182   x1 = xfig_x (-0.25); x2 = xfig_x (1.25);
00183   output << "     " << x1 << " " << 0  << " " << x2 << " " << 0 << endl;
00184 
00185   output << "2 1 1 1 35 -1 100 0 -1 0.000 0 0 -1 0 0 2" << endl; // tickmark y
00186   x2 = xfig_x (0.25); y1 = xfig_y (1);
00187   output << "     " << x1 << " " << y1 << " " << x2 << " " << y1 << endl;
00188 
00189   output << "2 1 1 1 35 -1 100 0 -1 0.000 0 0 -1 0 0 2" << endl; // axe y
00190   y1 = xfig_y (-0.25); y2 = xfig_y (1.25);
00191   output << "     " << 0 << " " << y1 << " " << 0 << " " << y2 << endl;
00192 
00193   output << "2 1 1 1 35 -1 100 0 -1 0.000 0 0 -1 0 0 2" << endl; // tickmark x
00194   x1 = xfig_x (1); y2 = xfig_y (0.25); 
00195   output << "     " << x1 << " " << y1 << " " << x1 << " " << y2 << endl;
00196 
00197   // "xfigicization" des objets de list_objects
00198   for (vector<FLTK_Graphic_Object *>::iterator index =
00199          display->list_objects.begin (); 
00200        index != display->list_objects.end (); 
00201        ++index)
00202     { 
00203       //(*index)->print ();
00204       (*index)->xfigicize (output);
00205     }
00206   // fermeture du fichier de sortie xfig
00207   output.close ();
00208 }

00210 // zoom management group
00211 void cb_zoom_plus (Fl_Widget *w, void *data)
00212   // la taille en pixel de l'unite est augmentee de 20%
00213 {
00214   FLTK_Display *display = (FLTK_Display *)data;
00215   double unit_size = display->get_unit_size ();
00216   unit_size = unit_size * 1.2;
00217   display->set_unit_size (unit_size);
00218   display->redraw ();
00219   Fl_Group *g = (Fl_Group *)w->parent ();
00220 //   g->child (1)-> label (form ("%.2f\n", unit_size));
00221   char *label;
00222   sprintf (label,"%.2f\n", unit_size);
00223   g->child (1)-> label (label);
00224 //
00225   g->window ()->redraw ();
00226 }
00227 
00228 void cb_zoom_minus (Fl_Widget *w, void *data) 
00229   // la taille en pixel de l'unite est diminuee de 20%
00230 {
00231   FLTK_Display *display = (FLTK_Display *)data;
00232   double unit_size = display->get_unit_size ();
00233   unit_size = unit_size * 0.8;
00234   display->set_unit_size (unit_size);
00235   display->redraw ();
00236   Fl_Group *g = (Fl_Group *)w->parent ();
00237 //   g->child (1)-> label (form ("%.2f\n", unit_size));
00238   char *label;
00239   sprintf (label, "%.2f\n", unit_size);
00240   g->child (1)-> label (label);
00241 //
00242   g->window ()->redraw ();
00243 }

00245 void cb_zoom_reset (Fl_Widget *w, void *data) 
00246   // la taille en pixel de l'unite est reinitialisee
00247 {
00248   FLTK_Display *display = (FLTK_Display *)data;
00249   double unit_size = display->get_init_unit_size ();

00252   Fl_Group *g = (Fl_Group *)w->parent ();

00259 }

00261 // scroll management group
00262 void cb_scroll_up (Fl_Widget *w, void *data)
00263   // la fenetre "monte" de 20% sa taille verticale
00264 {
00265   FLTK_Display *display = (FLTK_Display *)data;
00266   double scroll_y = display->get_scroll_y ();
00267   double height = display->h ();
00268   scroll_y = scroll_y - height / 5;
00269   display->set_scroll_y (scroll_y);
00270   display->redraw ();
00271   Fl_Group *g = (Fl_Group *)w->parent ();
00272 //   g->child (2)-> label (form ("%.0f\n", scroll_y));
00273   char *label;
00274   sprintf (label, "%.0f\n", scroll_y);
00275   g->child (2)-> label (label);
00276 //
00277   g->window ()->redraw ();
00278 }
00279 
00280 void cb_scroll_down (Fl_Widget *w, void *data) 
00281   // la fenetre "descend" de 20% sa taille verticale
00282 {
00283   FLTK_Display *display = (FLTK_Display *)data;
00284   double scroll_y = display->get_scroll_y ();
00285   double height = display->h ();
00286   scroll_y = scroll_y + height / 5;
00287   display->set_scroll_y (scroll_y);
00288   display->redraw ();
00289   Fl_Group *g = (Fl_Group *)w->parent ();
00290 //   g->child (2)-> label (form ("%.0f\n", scroll_y));
00291   char *label;
00292   sprintf (label, "%.0f\n", scroll_y);
00293   g->child (2)-> label (label);
00294 //
00295   g->window ()->redraw ();
00296 }

00298 void cb_scroll_left (Fl_Widget *w, void *data) 
00299   // la fenetre "se deplace vers la gauche" de 20% sa taille horizontale
00300 {
00301   FLTK_Display *display = (FLTK_Display *)data;
00302   double scroll_x = display->get_scroll_x ();
00303   double width = display->w ();
00304   scroll_x = scroll_x + width / 5;
00305   display->set_scroll_x (scroll_x);
00306   display->redraw ();
00307   Fl_Group *g = (Fl_Group *)w->parent ();
00308 //   g->child (1)-> label (form ("%.0f\n", scroll_x));
00309   char *label;
00310   sprintf (label, "%.0f\n", scroll_x);
00311   g->child (1)-> label (label);
00312 //
00313   g->window ()->redraw ();
00314 }

00334 void cb_scroll_reset (Fl_Widget *w, void *data) 
00335   // la fenetre "retrouve" sa position initiale
00336 {
00337   FLTK_Display *display = (FLTK_Display *)data;
00338   double scroll_x = display->get_init_scroll_x ();
00339   double scroll_y = display->get_init_scroll_y ();
00340   display->set_scroll_x (scroll_x);
00341   display->set_scroll_y (scroll_y);
00342   display->redraw ();
00343   Fl_Group *g = (Fl_Group *)w->parent ();
00344 //   g->child (1)-> label (form ("%.0f\n", scroll_x));
00345   char *label;
00346   sprintf (label, "%.0f\n", scroll_x);
00347   g->child (1)-> label (label);
00348 //   g->child (2)-> label (form ("%.0f\n", scroll_y));
00349   sprintf (label, "%.0f\n", scroll_y);
00350   g->child (2)-> label (label);
00351 //
00352   g->window ()->redraw ();
00353 }

00355 // constructeur(s)
00356 FLTK_Display_Control::FLTK_Display_Control (double _unit_size,
00357                                             double _scroll_x, double _scroll_y,
00358                                             int _w, int _h, char* _title)
00359   : Fl_Window (210, 140, _title),
00360     // quit button
00361     quit (0, 0, 62, 20, "Close"),
00362     // clear button
00363     clear (0, 0, 62, 20, "Clear"),
00364     // xfig output button
00365     xfig (0, 0, 62, 20, "Xfig"),
00366     // zoom management group
00367     zoom_group (0, 0, 85, 80, ""),
00368     zoom_title (5, 5, 75, 20, "Unit size"),
00369     zoom_value (30, 30, 50, 20),
00370     zoom_reset (30, 55, 50, 20, "Reset"),
00371     zoom_plus (5, 30, 20, 20, "+"),
00372     zoom_minus (5, 55, 20, 20, "-"),
00373     // scroll management group
00374     scroll_group (0, 0, 110, 105, ""),
00375     scroll_title (5, 5, 100, 20, "Scrolling"),
00376     scroll_value_x (30, 30, 50, 20), 
00377     scroll_value_y (30, 55, 50, 20),
00378     scroll_reset (5, 80, 100, 20, "Reset"),
00379     scroll_up (5, 55, 20 , 20, "u"),
00380     scroll_down (85, 55, 20, 20, "d"),
00381     scroll_left (5, 30, 20 , 20 , "l"),
00382     scroll_right (85, 30, 20 , 20 , "r")
00383 {
00384   // mise a jour des labels de zoom_value, scroll_value_x et scroll_value_y
00385   char *label1, *label2, *label3;
00386   sprintf (label1, "%.2f\n", _unit_size);
00387   sprintf (label2, "%.0f\n", _scroll_x );
00388   sprintf (label3, "%.0f\n", _scroll_x);
00389   zoom_value.label (label1);
00390   scroll_value_x.label (label2);
00391   scroll_value_y.label (label3);
00392 
00393   // creation du display
00394   display = new FLTK_Display (_unit_size, _scroll_x, _scroll_y, _w, _h,
00395                              _title);
00396   // quit button
00397   this->add (quit);
00398   quit.position (143, 5);
00399   quit.callback (cb_quit, display);
00400   // clear button
00401   this->add (clear);
00402   clear.position (5, 5);
00403   clear.callback (cb_clear, display);
00404   // xfig output button
00405   this->add (xfig);
00406   xfig.position (74, 5);
00407   xfig.callback (cb_xfig, display);
00408   // zoom management group
00409   zoom_group.begin ();
00410   zoom_group.add (zoom_title);
00411   zoom_group.add (zoom_value);
00412   zoom_group.add (zoom_reset);
00413   zoom_group.add (zoom_plus);
00414   zoom_group.add (zoom_minus);
00415   zoom_group.end ();
00416   zoom_group.box (FL_UP_BOX);
00417   zoom_value.box (FL_DOWN_BOX);
00418   zoom_value.align (FL_ALIGN_INSIDE | FL_ALIGN_RIGHT);
00419   zoom_plus.label(FL_SYMBOL_LABEL, "@8->");
00420   zoom_plus.callback (cb_zoom_plus, display);
00421   zoom_minus.label(FL_SYMBOL_LABEL, "@2->");
00422   zoom_minus.callback (cb_zoom_minus, display);
00423   zoom_reset.callback (cb_zoom_reset, display);
00424   this->add (zoom_group);
00425   zoom_group.position (5, 30);
00426   // scroll management group
00427   scroll_group.begin ();
00428   scroll_group.add (scroll_title);
00429   scroll_group.add (scroll_value_x);
00430   scroll_group.add (scroll_value_y);
00431   scroll_group.add (scroll_reset);
00432   scroll_group.add (scroll_up);
00433   scroll_group.add (scroll_down);
00434   scroll_group.add (scroll_left);
00435   scroll_group.add (scroll_right);
00436   scroll_group.end ();
00437   scroll_group.box (FL_UP_BOX);
00438   scroll_value_x.box (FL_DOWN_BOX);
00439   scroll_value_y.box (FL_DOWN_BOX);
00440   scroll_value_x.align (FL_ALIGN_INSIDE | FL_ALIGN_RIGHT);
00441   scroll_value_y.align (FL_ALIGN_INSIDE | FL_ALIGN_RIGHT);
00442   scroll_up.label (FL_SYMBOL_LABEL, "@8->");
00443   scroll_up.callback (cb_scroll_up, display);
00444   scroll_down.label (FL_SYMBOL_LABEL, "@2->");
00445   scroll_down.callback (cb_scroll_down, display);
00446   scroll_left.label (FL_SYMBOL_LABEL, "@4->");
00447   scroll_left.callback (cb_scroll_left, display);
00448   scroll_right.label (FL_SYMBOL_LABEL, "@6->");
00449   scroll_right.callback (cb_scroll_right, display);
00450   scroll_reset.callback (cb_scroll_reset, display);
00451   this->add (scroll_group);
00452   scroll_group.position (95, 30);
00453 
00454   end (); show ();
00455 }

00457 // ajout du callback
00458 void FLTK_Display_Control::add_callback (void _callback (Fl_Widget *, void *))
00459 { display->callback (_callback); }

00471 
00472 // conversion repere display -> repere monde 
00473 double worldify_x (int x, FLTK_Display *display) {
00474   double unit_size = display->get_unit_size ();
00475   double scroll_x = display->get_scroll_x ();
00476   return (display_to_world_x (x, unit_size, scroll_x));
00477 }
00478 
00479 double worldify_y (int y, FLTK_Display *display) {
00480   double unit_size = display->get_unit_size ();
00481   double scroll_y = display->get_scroll_y ();
00482   return (display_to_world_y (y, unit_size, scroll_y));
00483 }
